memberdef.argsstring: (double area, int decimals, QgsUnitTypes::AreaUnit unit, bool keepBaseUnit=false)
memberdef.name: formatArea

briefdescription.para: Returns an area formatted as a friendly string.

parameterdescription.para: number of decimal places to show
set to false to allow conversion of large areas to more suitable units, e.g., square meters to square kilometers

memberdef.argsstring: (double distance, int decimals, QgsUnitTypes::DistanceUnit unit, bool keepBaseUnit=false)
memberdef.name: formatDistance

briefdescription.para: Returns an distance formatted as a friendly string.

parameterdescription.para: number of decimal places to show
set to false to allow conversion of large distances to more suitable units, e.g., meters to kilometers

briefdescription.para: Returns the conversion factor between the specified distance units.

simplesect.para: multiplication factor to convert between units

briefdescription.para: Returns the conversion factor between the specified angular units.

simplesect.para: multiplication factor to convert between units

memberdef.argsstring: (double area, QgsUnitTypes::AreaUnit unit, int decimals, bool keepBaseUnit=false)
memberdef.name: scaledArea

briefdescription.para: Will convert an area with a given unit to an area value which is nice to display.

detaileddescription.para: It will convert between different units (e.g. from square meters to square kilometers) if appropriate, unless forced otherwise with keepBaseUnit. The value will also be rounded to decimals (be prepared that the returned value is still a double so it will require further formatting when converting to a string).

memberdef.argsstring: (double distance, QgsUnitTypes::DistanceUnit unit, int decimals, bool keepBaseUnit=false)
memberdef.name: scaledDistance

briefdescription.para: Will convert a distance with a given unit to a distance value which is nice to display.

detaileddescription.para: It will convert between different units (e.g. from meters to kilometers or millimeters) if appropriate, unless forced otherwise with keepBaseUnit. The value will also be rounded to decimals (be prepared that the returned value is still a double so it will require further formatting when converting to a string).

briefdescription.para: Converts a translated string to an areal unit.

parameterdescription.para: optional boolean, will be set to true if string was converted successfully

briefdescription.para: Converts a translated string to a distance unit.
